Change Log
==========

0.0.1(4/11/2022)
----------------
- First Release

0.0.2(4/11/2022)
- Fixed Import Error

0.0.3(4/11/2022)
- Added Read Function

0.0.3(4/11/2022)
- Added Unlist Parameter To All Functions That Read The File. The Unlist Parameter Makes It So That You Can Convert The (Readed) Text List To A Regular String
